text: are you hosting breakfast this holiday
season and wondering what to serve well
I have just the thing it's an easy egg
dish called a baked vegetable omelet it
serves 12 it's baked in a sheet pan and
it can be eaten warm or cold all it is
16 eggs in a bowl whisk these together
with a lot of eggs but it's gonna feed a
lot of people 2 teaspoons of salt
a quarter cup of all-purpose flour add
this slowly to try to avoid some lumps
this is going to help thicken up the
omelet when it bakes in the oven and
then one tablespoon plus one teaspoon of
chopped fresh thyme leaves this is going
to add really great flavor to the eggs
okay that's our egg base it's going to
go into a rimmed baking sheet that I
have oiled lined with parchment and
oiled again so just pour in and any of
these tiny lumps of flour are going to
bake out so don't worry about them
scooch it all around and then I have a
half of a red onion and three ounces of
spinach I'm just gonna scatter these
over the top you could really use any
vegetables here whenever you like
anything that'll cook quickly in the
oven if you like shallots or leeks those
would be great here the onion really
adds something nice to this egg dish now
the spinach and again any tender leafy
green would work well this is just some
small leaf spinach three ounces scatter
it around and it will cook into the egg
and look really great just kind of tuck
it into the egg okay so this goes into a
325 degree oven for about 20 minutes
it'll be puffed and golden and set okay
the omelet is done it looks beautiful
I'm just going to take a knife and run
it down the sides to release it from the
pan
pulls right out then I'm gonna release
it from the parchment just run a knife
underneath it then we can slip the
parchment out right onto the tray you
can see how thin this is it's really
great you can pick it right up with your
hand so I'm going to do 12 pieces I'll
do three lengthwise and then four across
in half and half again this is one of
those great dishes you can make for a
brunch and just leave out people can
help themselves some great protein and
vegetables this is really fun to eat and
great looking on your buffet everyone's
going to love it
you
